name: YBit
description: YBit is a pixelated platformer adventure that is still in development. You will be playing as a small hero made of information, trying to escape from a program that has crashed. Avoiding errors, not falling down and getting to the exits will be your mission.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.5GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
